tool_description: GLOBAL:  Country, City, and State Boundaries API: A simple & very fast API that will allow you to integrate multiple GeoJson World boundaries results into your apps and systems.This API is designed to be used programmatically for optimal performance.
name: Location Boundries
title: Location Boundries

api_list.name: GLOBAL Boundaries API
api_list.description: Boundaries API works via HTTP POST request and allows to get boundaries that the specified location is part of or that the specified location consists of.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://location-boundries.p.rapidapi.com/boundries/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-boundries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://location-boundries.p.rapidapi.com/boundries/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "location-boundries.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
